Name: Flamespark
Story Background: In the heart of the volcanic mountains, a spark ignites, turning into a blazing inferno that engulfs all in its path.
Ability: Flamespark deals 3 damage to any target. If you control a Mountain, it deals 5 damage instead.
Appearance Description: The card art shows a swirling vortex of fiery energy, with sparks leaping outwards and leaving trails of flames behind
